QueryList.Join: <%if(has(id)){%> AND id=:id <%}%> <%else if (has(id_not)){%> and A.id <> :id_not <%}%> <%else if (has(id_li)){%> and A.id like '%'||:id_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(tenantId)){%> AND tenantId=:tenantId <%}%> <%else if (has(tenantId_not)){%> and A.tenantId <> :tenantId_not <%}%> <%else if (has(tenantId_li)){%> and A.tenantId like '%'||:tenantId_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(personnelInfoId)){%> AND personnelInfoId=:personnelInfoId <%}%> <%else if (has(personnelInfoId_not)){%> and A.personnelInfoId <> :personnelInfoId_not <%}%> <%else if (has(personnelInfoId_li)){%> and A.personnelInfoId like '%'||:personnelInfoId_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(userName)){%> AND userName=:userName <%}%> <%else if (has(userName_not)){%> and A.userName <> :userName_not <%}%> <%else if (has(userName_li)){%> and A.userName like '%'||:userName_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(password)){%> AND password=:password <%}%> <%else if (has(password_not)){%> and A.password <> :password_not <%}%> <%else if (has(password_li)){%> and A.password like '%'||:password_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(status)){%> AND status=:status <%}%> <%else if (has(status_not)){%> and A.status <> :status_not <%}%> <%else if (has(status_li)){%> and A.status like '%'||:status_li||'%' <%}%> <%if(has(authorityGroupId)){%> AND authorityGroupId=:authorityGroupId <%}%> <%else if (has(authorityGroupId_not)){%> and A.authorityGroupId <> :authorityGroupId_not <%}%> <%else if (has(authorityGroupId_li)){%> and A.authorityGroupId like '%'||:authorityGroupId_li||'%' <%}%> <%if (has(orderby)) {%> ORDER BY A.${orderby} <%if (has(sort)){%> ${sort} <%}else{%> ASC <%}%> <%}%>
